package.name: marble_husky_sensor_config_5
package.description: The marble_husky_sensor_config_5 package - Has two pico flexx tof cameras - An RP Lidar S1 - Two OS1-64 3D Laser C - IMU - gas sensor - A planar lidar (RPLidar S1) - A microstrain 3DMGX5-25 IMU (AHRS) - Weight: about 85 lbs
package.author: Neil Johnson
